/* eslint-disable */ import React from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap'; import LoadingSpinner from '../../shared/loading_spinner'; import '../../../scss/individual_page/individual_page_game_info.scss'; export default function GameInfoPage(props) { if (!props.game) { return ; } console.log(props.game.platforms.platform.name); props.game.platforms.forEach((platform) => console.log(platform)) return ( About Game
